Scenario Description: Verify login with valid email and password
Expected Result: User logs in successfully and is redirected to the homepage

Scenario Description: Verify login with valid phone number and password
Expected Result: User logs in successfully using phone credentials

Scenario Description: Verify the 'Show Password' button displays password text when clicked
Verify 'Forgot Password' functionality redirects to reset page
Expected Result: User receives reset email and can reset password

Scenario Description: Verify 'Remember Me' checkbox stores credentials for future sessions
Expected Result: User credentials are pre-filled on next visit

Scenario Description: Verify the 'Login' button becomes enabled only after valid input
Expected Result: Button activates when both fields are filled

Scenario Description: Verify 'Logout' functionality logs the user out successfully
Expected Result: User is redirected back to the login screen

Scenario Description: Verify 'Create New Account' link opens the signup form
Verify login works across multiple browsers
Expected Result: Login successful on Chrome, Edge, Firefox

Scenario Description: Verify login page loads within acceptable time (under 3s)
Expected Result: Page loads quickly without layout issues

Scenario Description: Verify password input field is masked by default
Verify login page UI is responsive across devices
Expected Result: Layout adjusts correctly for all screen sizes

Scenario Description: Verify system rejects invalid email format
Expected Result: Validation error displayed for invalid email

Scenario Description: Verify error message for incorrect password
Verify system behavior when non-existent account is entered
Verify login behavior when email field is empty
Verify login behavior when password field is empty
Verify login behavior when both fields are empty
Verify SQL injection attempt in login fields
Verify system prevents XSS attacks via input fields
Verify login with deactivated account
Verify behavior for excessively long passwords
Verify trimming of whitespaces in email input
Verify autofill with outdated credentials
Verify system validation for invalid phone number format
Expected Result: Error displayed for invalid phone format

Scenario Description: Verify password is case-sensitive
Verify login attempt without internet connection
Verify session timeout behavior after inactivity
Verify system locks account after multiple failed attempts
Verify input validation for invalid password characters
